marklogic.body:
Be an ex-rockcrit myself, I find it really amusing when pieces that are hilariously borne out of nothing but the rockcrit mindset on here. There's a level of over saturation-based Tiredness in the tone, like with the comedy podcast piece. You have to be consuming media to the point of reviewing records every week, mainlining Perpetua, posting daily to I Love Music, or hosting a weekly radio gig to where topics this esoteric even begin to Dawn on you.
For everybody else, the answer is "what? What the hell are you talking about? No, dude."
